name: Phantom Strike Custom Gaming PC
description: The Phantom Strike Custom Gaming PC is built for elite gamers, featuring an Intel Core i9-13900K processor, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, and 32GB DDR5 RAM. With a 1TB NVMe SSD, it offers lightning-fast load times. The liquid cooling system ensures optimal performance during intense gaming sessions. Its sleek RGB-lit chassis enhances aesthetics, while Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2 provide seamless connectivity. Perfect for 4K gaming and VR, this PC delivers unmatched power and style.

name: MSI Pro 24X All-in-One PC
description: The MSI Pro 24X All-in-One PC combines style and functionality for home or office use. Powered by an Intel Core i5-12400, it includes 16GB DDR4 RAM and a 512GB SSD for smooth multitasking. The 23.8-inch Full HD IPS display offers vibrant visuals, while the slim bezel design saves desk space. Equipped with USB-C, HDMI, and Wi-Fi 6, it ensures versatile connectivity. Ideal for productivity, streaming, and light creative work.

name: HP EliteDesk 705 G5 Desktop
description: The HP EliteDesk 705 G5 Desktop is a reliable choice for small businesses and home offices. Featuring an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB SSD, it handles daily tasks with ease. The compact design fits any workspace, while multiple USB ports, DisplayPort, and VGA ensure flexible connectivity. With energy-efficient components and robust security features, this PC is perfect for productivity and secure operations.

name: Vortex Blade Gaming PC
description: The Vortex Blade Gaming PC delivers exceptional performance with an AMD Ryzen 7 5800X, NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU, and 32GB DDR4 RAM. Its 1TB NVMe SSD ensures rapid game loading. The advanced air cooling system maintains low temperatures, while the customizable RGB lighting adds flair. With support for ray tracing and 1440p gaming, this PC is ideal for competitive gamers seeking power and reliability in a compact, stylish chassis.

name: MSI Modern AM271P All-in-One

With a built-in webcam, Wi-Fi 6, and multiple ports, it’s perfect for video calls, design work, and office productivity.

The 23.8-inch Full HD touchscreen display is ideal for interactive tasks, while Wi-Fi 6 and USB-C ensure fast connectivity. Perfect for home offices.

name: HP ProDesk 400 G6 Microtower
description: The HP ProDesk 400 G6 Microtower is a compact desktop for everyday computing. Featuring an Intel Core i3-10100, 8GB DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB SSD, it’s suited for office tasks and light multitasking. The small footprint saves space, while HDMI, USB 3.2, and VGA ports offer connectivity. Ideal for home use.

name: Titan Surge Gaming PC
description: The Titan Surge Gaming PC is built for competitive gamers. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 7700X, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, and 32GB DDR5 RAM, it excels in 1440p and 4K gaming. The 1TB NVMe SSD ensures fast load times, while the liquid cooling system maintains performance. Perfect for enthusiasts.

name: MSI Pro 24X All-in-One PC
description: The MSI Pro 24X All-in-One PC is a compact and affordable option for small offices. Powered by an Intel Core i3-12100, it includes 8GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB SSD for basic tasks. The 23.8-inch Full HD display offers clear visuals, while USB 3.2 and HDMI ports provide connectivity. Ideal for students.

name: HP EliteDesk 800 G6 SFF
description: The HP EliteDesk 800 G6 SFF is a powerful desktop for professional use. Featuring an Intel Core i7-10700, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 512GB SSD, it excels in multitasking and data processing. The compact design fits any workspace, while DisplayPort, USB 3.1, and VGA ports ensure connectivity. Perfect for businesses.

name: Blaze Core Gaming PC
description: The Blaze Core Gaming PC is designed for high-performance gaming. Powered by an Intel Core i7-12700K, NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU, and 32GB DDR5 RAM, it delivers smooth 1440p and 4K gaming. The 1TB NVMe SSD offers fast storage, while the air cooling system ensures reliability. Ideal for gamers seeking performance.

name: MSI Prestige 27T All-in-One
description: The MSI Prestige 27T All-in-One PC is crafted for creative professionals. Powered by an Intel Core i7-12700, it features 32GB DDR4 RAM and a 1TB SSD for intensive tasks like video editing and 3D rendering. The 27-inch 4K UHD touchscreen delivers vibrant visuals, while Thunderbolt 4 and Wi-Fi 6 ensure fast connectivity. Its sleek design and powerful performance make it ideal for designers and content creators.

name: Aurora Blitz Gaming PC
description: The Aurora Blitz Gaming PC is engineered for top-tier gaming performance. Featuring an AMD Ryzen 9 7900X, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, and 32GB DDR5 RAM, it excels in 4K gaming and multitasking. The 1 TB NVMe SSD ensures rapid load times, while the advanced cooling system keeps temperatures low. With customizable RGB lighting and a sleek design, it’s perfect for gamers and content creators alike.

name: Starfire Elite Gaming PC
description: The Starfire Elite Gaming PC is crafted for top-tier gaming performance. Powered by an Intel Core i9 -12900K, NVIDIA RTX 4090 GPU, and 64GB DDR5 RAM, it excels in 4K gaming and demanding applications. The 2TB NVMe SSD provides ample storage and fast load times. With a liquid cooling system for optimal performance and customizable RGB lighting, it’s perfect for gamers and content creators seeking the best.

name: MSI Pro 22T All-in-One PC
description: The MSI Pro 22T All-in-One PC is a compact solution for home or office use. Equipped with an Intel Core i3-12100, 8GB DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB SSD, it handles everyday tasks like browsing and document editing efficiently. The 21.5-inch Full HD touchscreen offers intuitive navigation, while USB 3.2 and HDMI ports ensure connectivity. Its slim design saves desk space, making it ideal for students, remote workers, or small businesses seeking affordability and functionality.

name: HP ProDesk 605 G8 Desktop
description: The HP ProDesk 605 G8 Desktop is designed for small businesses and home offices. Featuring an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 512GB SSD, it offers reliable performance for multitasking and productivity apps. The compact design fits any workspace, with DisplayPort, USB 3.2, and VGA ports for versatile connectivity. Energy-efficient components and robust security features make it a dependable choice for secure, everyday computing needs.

name: Nebula Blitz Gaming PC
description: The Nebula Blitz Gaming PC is a powerhouse for mid-to-high-end gaming. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 7700X, NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU, and 32GB DDR5 RAM, it excels in 1440p and 4K gaming. A 1TB NVMe SSD provides fast storage, while the air cooling system ensures consistent performance. The sleek chassis with RGB lighting adds flair, and Wi-Fi 6E support ensures seamless online gaming. Ideal for gamers seeking a balance of power and value.

name: MSI Modern AM252P All-in-One
description: The MSI Modern AM252P All-in-One PC is tailored for professionals and creatives. Powered by an Intel Core i7-12700, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 1TB SSD, it handles demanding tasks like video editing and multitasking with ease. The 23.8-inch Full HD touchscreen delivers vibrant visuals, while Wi-Fi 6 and USB-C ports ensure fast connectivity. Its minimalist design and adjustable stand make it perfect for modern offices, classrooms, or home studios.

name: HP EliteDesk 800 G7 SFF

name: Eclipse Pulse Gaming PC

The compact design saves space, while VGA, DisplayPort, and USB 2.0 ports provide connectivity. Ideal for students, small offices, or home users seeking an affordable, reliable PC for everyday tasks.
